heroSection.title: Hey, I'm Silvia
heroSection.subtitle: Full Stack
heroSection.description: I am passionate about web development, UI/UX and accessibility. Are you curious to find out more about me?

frontEnd.title: Front-End
frontEnd.description: HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, React.js, Vite, SASS

backEnd.title: Back-End
backEnd.description: Node.js, MongoDB, RESTful API, Postman, Express.js

booki.title: Booki
booki.description: Responsive website of a travel agency developed in HTML and CSS, that allows customers to find accommodation and activities in the city they are looking for.

sophieBluel.title: Sophie Bluel
sophieBluel.description: This project involves creating a dynamic webpage for an interior designer using JavaScript, focusing on user interactions, DOM manipulation, and API communication.

ninaCarducci.title: Nina Carducci
ninaCarducci.description: Improve the SEO, performance and accessibility of a website by identifying problems and applying fixes, using tools such as Chrome Dev Tools, Lighthouse and Wave.

kasa.title: Kasa
kasa.description: This project involves building the front-end of a real estate rental app using React, React Router, and Vite, focusing on dynamic UI development, page navigation, and styling with Sass.

monVieuxGrimoire.title: Mon Vieux Grimoire
monVieuxGrimoire.description: This project involves developing the back-end of a book rating site using, Node.js, Express and MongoDB, implementing CRUD operations, secure authentication, and image handling. It follows an MVC architecture and uses Mongoose for data modeling.

aboutMeSection.title: About
aboutMeSection.heading: About Me
aboutMeSection.description1: With a Master‚Äôs degree in Foreign Languages for International Business, I bring advanced proficiency in English, French, and Italian, complemented by expertise in digital marketing and international law. My career began in export sales, where I honed my skills in managing international relations and intercultural communication. Driven by a passion for technology, I transitioned into Web development, merging my technical capabilities with a strategic, business-oriented approach.
aboutMeSection.description2: I specialize in crafting digital solutions that are not only technically robust but also aligned with global business needs and regulatory standards. I am eager to collaborate on projects that leverage my multidisciplinary expertise to deliver impactful results in the technology sector. üåç
